sources.title: Fisherman's Luck (1945)
sources.description: Opening with a few painful punful examples of various types of fish...a sunfish 'sets' and a starfish 'comes out', Gandy Goose and his pal go deep-sea fishing with the intent to land one of the denizens of the deep, with no luck until a whale appears. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/fishermans-luck-1945/

metadata.Plot: Opening with a few painful punful examples of various types of fish...a sunfish 'sets' and a starfish 'comes out', Gandy Goose and his pal go deep-sea fishing with the intent to land one of the denizens of the deep, with no luck until a whale appears.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
